title: Google Cloud Computing Foundation
headline: Learn about the technologies and services offered by the Google Cloud Platform (GCP), in this cloud computing course.
description: In this free online course you will learn how the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) can be used for: building apps and APIs, machine learning, networking, cloud security, storage options and more. Start the course today and enhance your knowledge and skills and boost your career prospects, by studying this comprehensive foundation course.
courseDescription:
In this course, you will be introduced to the world of cloud computing, where you will find out what the cloud is and explore the infrastructure and services offered by the Google Cloud Platform. Diagrams, screenshots and assessment questions included in the course are designed to give you a comprehensive foundation in the cloud architect, cloud engineer or data scientist profession, enabling you to take serious steps into this career.
The course begins by introducing you to what the cloud is, which will help you understand the Google Cloud Platform itself. You will then explore what this platform offers organizations around the world, covering topics such as: how to use GCP to build your apps, storage options, the role of the API, cloud security, networking, automation and monitoring, managed data processing services and the role of machine learning.
This course will be of interest to students and professionals who need a solid foundation in Google Cloud Platform technologies and services. You can start this course here and learn valuable skills in the area of Google Cloud Platform development.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
